Package org.drip.product.params

Class StandardCDXParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.product.params.StandardCDXParams
  • public class StandardCDXParams
extends java.lang.Object
    StandardCDXParams implements the parameters used to create the standard CDX - the coupon, the number of components, and the currency.

    • Module = Product Core Module
    • Library = Fixed Income Analytics
    • Project = Product Components/Baskets for Credit, FRA, FX, Govvie, Rates, and Option AssetClasses
    • Package = Fixed Income Product Customization Parameters


    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
